description: Evaluacion de la vulnerabilidad y adaptacion del sistema hidrico al cambio climatico de Costa Rica

subproject.corporate outcome: National and local governments and communities have the capacities to adapt to climate change and make inclusive and sustainable environment & energy decisions benefitting in particular under-served populations
subproject.description: Strengthen institutional capacities to formulate and implement adaptation policies and strategies  for people, industry and  groups, in particular, for those who live in geographical locations with a low development index;  through the assessment of current vulnerability  and the potential future impacts of climate change  in Costa Rica, and the promotion of adaptation strategies to safeguard the water resources.
subproject.gender code: No noticeable contribution to gender equality
subproject.title: Vulnerabilidad y adaptacion Si
